casebody.data:
PHG ASHEVILLE, LLC
v.
CITY OF ASHEVILLE 434PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Catherine A. Hofmann, Assistant City Attorney, for City of Asheville. Thomas E. Terrell, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for PHG Asheville, LLC. Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for PHG Asheville, LLC. Robin Tatum Currin, City Attorney, for City of Asheville. Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for City of Asheville. Chad W. Essick, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for City of Asheville. Colin R. McGrath, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for City of Asheville. N. Cosmo Zinkow, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for City of Asheville.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of June 2019 by Respondent to Supplement the Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
